titles.title: Licca the Movie: Licca-chan to Yamaneko Hoshi no Tabi
Licca the movie リカちゃん リカちゃんとヤマネコ星の旅

relatedanime.anime: Licca-chan Fushigi na Fushigi na Yunia Monogatari

anime.description: * Based on the popular Licca doll in Japan. The characters later also appeared in the Super Doll Licca-chan series. Licca goes on vacation with her father. The town in the mountains they go to is the site of a festival of the stars that has a mystical background, which is more real than Licca expected when she ends up in the middle of the mystical battle for the festival. Source: Licca Note: Originally produced in 1994 to be shown in cinema, it wasn`t released due to circumstances until 1997, when it was sold on video.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
